description:
Sawyer`s Honedge was revealed after Sawyer`s Shelgon was defeated in the 3-on-3 battle against Ash. Sawyer exclaimed that it wouldn`t lose but it was matched up against Pikachu and lost in a 1-hit KO by Pikachu`s Thunderbolt.
Sawyer`s Doublade is the evolved form of Sawyer`s Honedge. It evolved sometime after Ash`s battle with Sawyer in XYZ 13 and before their battle in XYZ 26.
name: Hitotsuki (Shouta)
